attributes.additional_details:
I would like there to be another General Election.

There is no doubt the Labour Government are failing the British People, they have gone back on the promises they laid out in the lead up to the last election. The volume of illegal immigrates that are entering our country on a daily basis is beyond belief.
The British people have a right to protect their country, our soldiers lost their lives in WW2 to protect this country. 
The Labour government need to step down The British people are at risk
attributes.background: Hold a general election by the end of 2025

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Call an immediate general election
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
